title: WFP says delivering food in Tigray, hopes for air bridge soon
content:
1. WFP says delivering food in Tigray, hopes for air bridge soon  Reuters
  2. 'Free, unfettered access' needed to assist millions in war-torn Tigray  UN News
  3. Ethiopia denies it's trying to 'suffocate' Tigray region  The Associated Press
  4. Ethiopia is falling apart, but Abiy still has a choice  Al Jazeera English
  5. Ethiopian refugees in Sudan hope for a better future | Millions displaced in Tigray region | News  WION

localize.title: WFP、ティグライ州での食糧供給を開始、早期の空路開設を希望
